movie_name: Ramayana: The Legend of Prince Rama
bio: An anime adaptation of the Hindu epic the Ramayana, where Lord Ram combats the wicked king Ravana.An anime adaptation of the Hindu epic the Ramayana, where Lord Ram combats the wicked king Ravana.An anime adaptation of the Hindu epic the Ramayana, where Lord Ram combats the wicked king Ravana.
